StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateFYMissionPlanning]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FYMissionPlanningID as uniqueiden..er, @Organiza.onGuid as uniqueiden..er, @Organiza.onID as integer, @FiscalYear as integer, @E.ec.veDate as date.me, @CampusProspec.ngDays as integer, @UserLogin as varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[FYMissionPlanning] WHERE [FYMissionPlanningID] = @FYMissionPlanningID)
BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[FYMissionPlanning] SET [E.ec.veDate] =@E.ec.veDate ,[CampusProspec.ngDays] = @CampusProspec.ngDays ,[User_Login] = @UserLogin ,[Update_Date] = GetDate() WHERE [FYMissionPlanningID] = @FYMissionPlanningID END ELSE BEGIN
IF @Organiza.onGuid = cast(cast(0 as binary) as uniqueiden..er) or @Organiza.onGuid is null BEGIN Select @Organiza.onGuid = [rowguid] from [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WHERE [Organiza.on_ID] = @Organiza.onID END ELSE BEGIN Select @Organiza.onID = [Organiza.on_ID] from [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WHERE [rowguid] = @Organiza.onGuid END INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[FYMissionPlanning] ([FYMissionPlanningID] ,[Organiza.onRowGuid] ,[Organiza.on_ID] ,[FiscalYear] ,[E.ec.veDate] ,[CampusProspec.ngDays] ,[User_Login] ,[Update_Date]) VALUES (@FYMissionPlanningID ,@Organiza.onGuid ,@Organiza.onID ,@FiscalYear ,@E.ec.veDate ,@CampusProspec.ngDays ,@UserLogin ,GetDate())
END
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
